member.name: M:Sitecore.Framework.Pipelines.ProgressReporter.For``1(System.Action{``0})
member.summary: Returns an instance of IProgress\ to handle progress reporting. If the given handler is null a 'NoOp' instance is returned that returns immediately during reporting.
member.typeparam: The type of object to be reported.
member.param: The action to be invoked when reporting.
